resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Our address is: 308 Stirling Highway Claremont 6010
How to use the Heritage Walks App
Step 1: Select the walk you would like to do by tapping on the name
Step 2: Make your own way to the first stop that is listed. Use the Map to help you find it!
Step 3: Tap on the stop to view the address and historical details of this stop.
